channel.title: Team-Up - March Thursdays 8pmET
channel.description:
Team-Up is a game about unlikely **superhero team-ups**. It’s about building trust, overcoming differences, and taking down the big boss.
This is a playtest of a game currently in development. If you don’t like testing unpolished systems, do not sign up for these sessions. To paraphrase Jammi: the game might not work as expected, but I will try to make sure everyone has fun.
-----------
* **System** : [Team-Up](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Zpe4P8OfKmhJpUb0ZFyYuvoBw1bEgmq3uTsHSxN0kGI/edit?usp=sharing) - Playtest (PbtA) * **Schedule** : Thursdays at 8pmET in March, four 2.5-hour sessions * **Breaks** : Two 10-minute breaks * **Tone** : Comic Book Superheroes; Cartoon Violence; Witty Banter * **Venue** : GM’s Zoom * **Recording Session** : With consent from all players * **Posting Recording** : With consent from all players * **Attendance** : Joining all four sessions is ideal but not required * **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and any others suggested by the players
Additional information:
* [Concept, Aim, Tone, Subject Matter](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TaD4j7cZZ4-kS08RtYFTpI_F3BgVWOlpu00UsODvnyI/edit?usp=sharing) (CATS) * GM’s [Statement of Style](https://forms.gle/Fd64WdaafdfE9dCe7)
This game will follow the Gauntlet [Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html)
---------------- Sign-up for each session here:
Mar 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MRFhfwuXVVHelgmF1-W Mar 11: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MRFiGWsJVLXbAgjSqd3 Mar 18: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MRFiLPr-I7nhkl5ZyNM Mar 25: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MRFiuRNT3lPA-GKPFqF

item.title: Team-Up - March Thursdays 8pmET
item.dc:creator: @brownorama
item.description:
@brownorama wrote:

Team-Up is a game about unlikely superhero team-ups. It’s about building trust, overcoming differences, and taking down the big boss.

This is a playtest of a game currently in development. If you don’t like testing unpolished systems, do not sign up for these sessions. To paraphrase Jammi: the game might not work as expected, but I will try to make sure everyone has fun.

  • System : Team-Up - Playtest (PbtA)
  • Schedule : Thursdays at 8pmET in March, four 2.5-hour sessions
  • Breaks : Two 10-minute breaks
  • Tone : Comic Book Superheroes; Cartoon Violence; Witty Banter
  • Venue : GM’s Zoom
  • Recording Session : With consent from all players
  • Posting Recording : With consent from all players
  • Attendance : Joining all four sessions is ideal but not required
  • Safety : Lines & Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and any others suggested by the players

Additional information:

  • Concept, Aim, Tone, Subject Matter (CATS)
  • GM’s Statement of Style

This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct

Sign-up for each session here:

Mar 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MRFhfwuXVVHelgmF1-W
Mar 11: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MRFiGWsJVLXbAgjSqd3
Mar 18: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MRFiLPr-I7nhkl5ZyNM
Mar 25: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MRFiuRNT3lPA-GKPFqF
